name: Layered Silver Chains with Pendant
description: A duo of silver chains with a symbolic pendant for layered sophistication.
stylistNotes: Best styled over a t-shirt and blazer for a modern groom.
materialCare: Polish gently. Remove before sleeping.

name: Flat Luxe Gold Chain
description: Sleek flat gold chain that radiates subtle charm.
stylistNotes: Works best with unbuttoned shirts and beach wedding looks.
materialCare: Wipe after use. Avoid alcohol-based sprays.

name: Gold Figaro Chain Necklace
description: Stylish figaro-style gold chain that offers a vintage masculine touch.
stylistNotes: Looks great with dark-colored turtlenecks or knits.
materialCare: Keep in a fabric-lined box. Avoid excess heat.

name: Minimal Silver Box Chain
description: Subtle silver box chain ideal for layering or solo wear.
stylistNotes: Perfect under formal shirts or blazers.
materialCare: Store in anti-tarnish pouch. Avoid perfumes.

name: Gold Rope Chain Necklace
description: Classic gold rope chain that adds a bold yet elegant statement.
stylistNotes: Pairs best with open shirts for a beach or summer wedding vibe.
materialCare: Avoid moisture. Clean with a soft dry cloth.

name: Classic Maroon Satin Tie
description: Elegant maroon tie crafted in satin, suitable for formal occasions.
stylistNotes: Complements white or grey shirts with charcoal blazers.
materialCare: Dry clean only. Iron at low heat.

name: Purple Striped Wedding Bowtie
description: Striking purple bowtie with stripes for a unique groom look.
stylistNotes: Goes well with grey suits and lavender themes.
materialCare: Gentle wash or dry clean.

name: Black Satin Tuxedo Bowtie
description: Classic black bowtie made for tuxedos and formal evenings.
stylistNotes: A timeless pick for black tie events.
materialCare: Dry clean preferred.

name: Light Pink Satin Bowtie
description: Soft pink satin bowtie suited for spring weddings.
stylistNotes: Best with navy or grey suits and floral boutonnieres.
materialCare: Spot clean with damp cloth.

name: Maroon Velvet Bowtie Set
description: Rich velvet bowtie in maroon with matching pocket square.
stylistNotes: Perfect for winter weddings and receptions.
materialCare: Steam only. Avoid wringing.

name: Midnight Blue Formal Bandhgala
description: An elegant deep navy blue bandhgala with sleek tailoring. Ideal for night receptions or formal weddings.
stylistNotes: Brown or camel shoes work best. Can be accessorized with a lapel pin.
materialCare: Iron inside out. Dry clean only.

name: Rich Chocolate Brown Bandhgala
description: A sharp chocolate brown bandhgala suit with metallic buttons and a satin pocket square for a formal, regal look.
stylistNotes: Add tan loafers and a golden brooch for a more premium appearance.
materialCare: Steam press recommended. Dry clean after each wear.

name: Classic Beige Bandhgala Set
description: A beige textured jodhpuri-style suit with a clean modern silhouette. Perfect for engagement or sangeet ceremonies.
stylistNotes: Pair it with traditional loafers and a subtle brooch to enhance the ethnic charm.
materialCare: Dry clean only. Avoid direct heat on fabric.

name: Ivory Embroidered Sherwani Set
description: Intricately embroidered ivory sherwani with tonal pants. Ideal for the groom or close family members.
stylistNotes: Pairs beautifully with tan brogues and golden cufflinks.
materialCare: Dry clean only. Handle embroidery with care.

name: Mauve Royal Bandhgala with Buckle
description: A unique mauve indo-western piece with a modern belt buckle and sleek detailing.
stylistNotes: Minimal accessories required. Let the jacket do the talking.
materialCare: Use padded hangers. Dry clean only.

name: Champagne Gold Embroidered Sherwani
description: Subtle champagne gold sherwani with intricate thread work. A statement for any wedding event.
stylistNotes: Stick to neutral-toned footwear and minimal jewelry for elegance.
materialCare: Do not iron on embroidery. Dry clean only.

name: Pink Embroidered Indo-Western
description: Bold magenta Indo-western layered set with floral embroidery, perfect for mehendi or haldi events.
stylistNotes: Best worn barefoot or with cream mojaris in garden/outdoor events.
materialCare: Air dry after use. Dry clean only.

name: Black Embellished Kurta Set
description: All-black kurta set with tonal embellishments and a tailored over-jacket, ideal for evening functions.
stylistNotes: Add bold accessories like metallic brooch or silver rings for a dapper effect.
materialCare: Use garment cover. Dry clean only.

name: Embroidered White Asymmetric Sherwani
description: A grand ivory sherwani with asymmetrical hem and detailed embroidery, ideal for grooms.
stylistNotes: Wear with cream mojaris and a golden safa for a majestic look.
materialCare: Avoid direct perfume contact. Dry clean only.

name: Cream Western Suit Set
description: Classic cream western two-piece suit, suitable for reception parties or semi-formal functions.
stylistNotes: Pair with a white shirt and brown leather loafers for an understated yet classy finish.
materialCare: Use steam iron. Store with suit cover.

name: Classic Black Tuxedo
description: A timeless double-breasted black tuxedo with satin lapels, ideal for evening receptions and black-tie events.
stylistNotes: Pair with patent leather shoes and a sleek watch for a refined look.
materialCare: Dry clean only. Steam lightly before wearing.

name: Modern Blue Casual Suit
description: Stylish and comfortable slim-fit blue suit paired with a white T-shirt for casual yet smart events.
stylistNotes: Perfect for engagement parties or day events. Complete with sneakers for a fresh urban vibe.
materialCare: Machine wash cold, dry clean for best results.

name: Olive Green Regal Suit
description: A statement double-breasted olive suit with sharp tailoring for modern groomsmen or cocktail evenings.
stylistNotes: Pair with a patterned pocket square and polished brogues for an elegant finish.
materialCare: Dry clean only.

name: Coral Paisley Heritage Kurta
description: A vibrant coral-pink kurta adorned with intricate paisley motifs, featuring a classic band collar and brass‑tone button placket. Crafted for festive daytime weddings or celebratory functions.
stylistNotes: Pairs beautifully with ivory churidars or beige juttis. Ideal for day events and Mehndi ceremonies.
materialCare: 100% cotton. Gentle machine wash cold; line dry in shade. Steam or warm iron.

name: Cream Floral Elegance Kurta
description: Soft cream kurta adorned with a delicate, multicolor floral print over a subtle embossed base. Features a mandarin collar and tonal button detailing—perfect for evening cocktails or sangeet.
stylistNotes: Best styled with off‑white slim-fit trousers and embellished mojris for a refined festive look.
materialCare: Silk blend. Dry clean only to preserve delicate print and texture.

name: Ivory Pastel Motif Kurta
description: Elegant ivory kurta with understated pastel floral motifs spread across the fabric. Straight cut with full sleeves—perfect for daytime reception or family gatherings.
stylistNotes: Complements white trousers and tan leather kolhapuris for a polished daytime ensemble.
materialCare: Lightweight cotton-silk. Hand wash cold or gentle cycle; iron low after turning inside out.

name: Pale Blue Shimmer Sequin Kurta
description: A luxurious pale-blue kurta embellished with subtle sequin embroidery across the chest and shoulders. Features a stand collar and easy-fit silhouette—designed to catch the light during evening events.
stylistNotes: Ideal for nighttime events—pair with white dhoti pants and metallic slip-on shoes for an elegant glow.
materialCare: Premium linen-rayon blend with delicate sequin touches. Dry clean only. Store flat or folded in tissue to protect sequins.

name: Ivory Kurta with Handwoven Blue Jacket
description: A minimal white kurta-pyjama set enhanced by a rich blue multicolor Nehru jacket, ideal for Haldi or Mehendi functions.

description: Elegant red kurta with mirror work detailing, paired with off-white dhoti pants.

name: Olive Green Embroidered Nehru Jacket Set
description: This elegant kurta set features a silk blend beige kurta-pajama paired with an olive green embroidered Nehru jacket showcasing intricate temple artwork and beadwork.
stylistNotes: Pair this with classic brown loafers and a statement brooch for a daytime engagement or mehendi ceremony.
materialCare: Dry clean only. Store in a cool, dry place.

name: Ivory Kurta with Blush Pink Floral Jacket
description: A pastel-toned ivory kurta set with a blush pink floral embroidered Nehru jacket, perfect for elegant daytime ceremonies.
stylistNotes: Ideal for garden weddings or roka functions. Style with tan loafers and a pocket square.
materialCare: Steam iron on low heat. Dry clean preferred.

name: Dusty Rose Short Kurta Set with Jacket
description: A dusty rose monochrome kurta-pajama set paired with a subtly embroidered Nehru jacket, giving a minimalist festive vibe.
stylistNotes: Add a layered brooch chain and embroidered juttis to amp up the glam for evening functions.
materialCare: Do not bleach. Hand wash inside out or dry clean.

name: Navy Blue Embroidered Sherwani Set
description: This royal navy sherwani is richly adorned with geometric embroidery and beaded work, making it ideal for grand celebrations.
stylistNotes: Team with black patent leather shoes and a classic watch for a statement look.
materialCare: Professional dry clean only. Store in garment bag.

name: Blush Pink Indo-Western with Gold Buttons
description: A sophisticated Indo-western ensemble featuring a blush pink asymmetrical jacket with gold metal buttons, paired with crisp white trousers.
stylistNotes: Pair with black loafers and minimal accessories for a regal baraat or wedding guest look.
materialCare: Dry clean only. Avoid harsh detergents.

name: Maroon Textured Kurta Set with Long Jacket
description: A deep maroon structured long jacket with tonal kurta-pants, featuring subtle golden thread detailing.
stylistNotes: Works best for a reception or formal wedding dinner. Match with pointed loafers and gold accessories.
materialCare: Dry clean only. Iron inside out.

name: Navy Casual Shirt & Beige Chinos Set
description: A deep navy button-down shirt styled with slim beige chinos and white sneakers — ideal for weekend brunches or semi-formal gatherings.
stylistNotes: The navy-beige combination is timeless and polished. Roll up the shirt sleeves for a relaxed yet sharp vibe — perfect for smart-casual occasions
materialCare: Shirt – cotton-poly: machine wash cold, gentle cycle. Chinos – cotton twill: machine wash warm, tumble low dry; iron as needed.

name: Crisp White Shirt & Beige Trousers Duo
description: A pristine white button-down shirt paired with neutral beige trousers and clean white sneakers — perfect for casual office-wear or daytime events.
stylistNotes: White-on-beige feels fresh and refined. Tuck the shirt in fully and pair with no-show socks or minimal white trainers for a polished look.
materialCare: Shirt – premium cotton: cold machine wash; hang dry. Trousers – cotton-linen blend: gentle wash; warm iron.

name: Rustic Brown Trousers with Suspenders Ensemble
description: Rich brown trousers styled with leather suspenders and matching bow-tie — ideal for rustic-themed weddings or vintage-inspired events.
stylistNotes: Button-on suspenders elevate formality; pair with a crisp shirt—no belt needed. Earth-toned accessories like burgundy or burnt-orange socks enhance fall vibes.
materialCare: Trousers – wool blend: dry clean only. Suspenders – leather/elastic: spot clean. Bow tie – silk: spot clean.

name: Smart White Shirt & Taupe Chinos Set
description: Crisp white shirt styled with light taupe chinos and clean white sneakers — ideal for daytime outings or casual office looks.
stylistNotes: Keep shirt untucked or half-tucked with chinos; cuff the pants slightly and pair with minimalist white sneakers for a relaxed, modern aesthetic.
materialCare: Shirt – cotton-poplin: wash cold, hang dry. Chinos – cotton blend: gentle machine wash, low tumble; warm iron.

name: Black Bistro Shirt & Dark Trouser Combo
description: A tailored black button-down shirt matched with charcoal trousers and leather Oxford shoes — perfect for evening dinners and cocktail events.
stylistNotes: Dark monochrome creates a sleek modern look. Contrast with brown leather shoes or belt to add warmth and depth.
materialCare: Shirt & trousers – cotton-viscose blend: machine wash cold; hang dry; iron low heat.
